entry.title: Israel Battles on Multiple Fronts as Conflict Risks Spreading
entry.content: Israeli forces battled on four fronts in a fresh sign that the war with Hamas was slowly expanding to Iran-backed forces around the region.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What to Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.

entry.title: Behind Hamas's Piecemeal Hostage Strategy
entry.content: The militant group has freed four hostages but is seeking to extract more concessions from the Israelis for the release of others.
